20110127030705.000|20110127030707.000|CC1|THINGS, AND IT'S TERRIBLY       
20110127030707.000|20110127030709.000|CC1|IMPORTANT THAT WE TAKE OUR      
20110127030709.000|20110127030710.000|CC1|EXISTING MANUFACTURING BASE,    
20110127030710.000|20110127030712.000|CC1|PROTECT IT, ENHANCE IT AND GROW 
20110127030712.000|20110127030713.000|CC1|IT WHILE WE'RE LOOKING TO CREATE
20110127030713.000|20110127030714.000|CC1|NEW JOBS IN THE NEW ECONOMY.    
20110127030714.000|20110127030716.000|CC1|WE NEED TO HAVE BOTH.           
20110127030716.000|20110127030718.000|CC1|THERE'S NOT ENOUGH JOBS IN THE  
20110127030718.000|20110127030719.000|CC1|SO-CALLED NEW ECONOMY QUICKLY   
20110127030719.000|20110127030720.000|CC1|ENOUGH TO PUT PEOPLE BACK ON ITS
20110127030720.000|20110127030721.000|CC1|FEET.                           
20110127030721.000|20110127030722.000|CC1|AND IN OUR UNION, WE HAVE THE   
20110127030722.000|20110127030723.000|CC1|MOST PRODUCTIVE RUBBER WORKERS  
20110127030723.000|20110127030725.000|CC1|IN THE WORLD, THE MOST          
20110127030725.000|20110127030728.000|CC1|PRODUCTIVE PAPER WORKERS,       
20110127030728.000|20110127030729.000|CC1|ALUMINUM SMELTER WORKERS, STEEL 
20110127030729.000|20110127030731.000|CC1|WORKERS, AND SO WHAT WE NEED IS 
20110127030731.000|20110127030733.000|CC1|TO MAKE SURE WE BRING DEMAND    
20110127030733.000|20110127030734.000|CC1|BACK AND PROTECT OUR INDUSTRY   
20110127030734.000|20110127030736.000|CC1|AND PROTECT IT AGAINST UNFAIR   
20110127030736.000|20110127030736.000|CC1|TRADE.                          
20110127030736.000|20110127030739.000|CC1|>> BUT THE PRIVATE SECTOR IS NOT
20110127030739.000|20110127030740.000|CC1|INVESTING WITH $2 TRILLION ON

20110127030745.000|20110127030746.000|CC1|INVESTMENT.

20110127033040.000|20110127033041.000|CC1|IS THAT ACCURATE?

20110127035600.000|20110127035601.000|CC1|ARIZONA CUT FUNDING FOR SOME    
20110127035601.000|20110127035603.000|CC1|KINDS OF ORGAN TRANSPLANTS FROM 
20110127035603.000|20110127035604.000|CC1|ITS MEDICAID BUDGET.            
20110127035604.000|20110127035606.000|CC1|THINK ABOUT THAT.               
20110127035606.000|20110127035608.000|CC1|IT'S PRETTY SEVERE, ISN'T IT?

20110127035610.000|20110127035611.000|CC1|AFFORD TRANSPLANTS THAT COULD

20110127035618.000|20110127035621.000|CC1|BY SAYING THAT THESE            
20110127035621.000|20110127035622.000|CC1|TRANSPLANTS, WELL, THEY ALMOST  
20110127035622.000|20110127035623.000|CC1|NEVER WORKED.
